SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.network.RMI.server.game

Class ServerGameCommandsImpl

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.network.RMI.server.game.ServerGameCommandsImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerGameCommandsInterface, Remote
public class ServerGameCommandsImpl extends Object implements ServerGameCommandsInterface
Implementation of the ServerGameCommandsInterface interface for RMI connections. This class is responsible for receiving commands from the clients for game purposes. It is used to add and remove players, set the starter card, set the objective card, place a card, draw a card, set the number of players and synchronize the client's view.

      public void setStarterCard (@NotNull @NotNull String nick, boolean isRetro) throws RemoteException, GameStatusException
      Description copied from interface: ServerGameCommandsInterface
      This method is used to place the starter card.
      Specified by:
      setStarterCard in interface ServerGameCommandsInterface
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player who is setting the starter card.
      isRetro - True if the card placed on its retro, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs.
      GameStatusException - If the game is not in the right status to place the starter card.

    • setObjectiveCard

      public void setObjectiveCard (@NotNull @NotNull String nick, int cardId) throws RemoteException, IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException, GameStatusException

      Specified by:
      setObjectiveCard in interface ServerGameCommandsInterface

      nick - The nickname of the player who is setting the personal objective card.
      cardId - The id of the card to set.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs.
      IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException - If the player tries to choose a card, that is not in the candidate objective list.
      GameStatusException - If the game is not in the right status to set the personal objective card.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard (@NotNull @NotNull String nick, int cardId, int x, int y, boolean isRetro) throws RemoteException, TurnsOrderException, IllegalCardPlacingException, NotInHandException, GameStatusException
      Description copied from interface: ServerGameCommandsInterface
      This method is used to place a card on the player field
      Specified by:
      placeCard in interface ServerGameCommandsInterface
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player who is placing the card
      cardId - The id of the card to place
      x - The x coordinate of the card
      y - The y coordinate of the card
      isRetro - True if the card placed on its retro, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs
      TurnsOrderException - If the player is trying to place a card in the wrong turn
      IllegalCardPlacingException - If the player is trying to place a card in an illegal position
      NotInHandException - If the player is trying to place a card that is not in his hand
      GameStatusException - If the game is not in the right status to place the card

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard (@NotNull @NotNull String nick, boolean fromVisible, @NotNull @NotNull PlayableCardType type, int cardId) throws RemoteException, IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException, TurnsOrderException, IllegalPickActionException, EmptyDeckException, MaxHandSizeException, GameStatusException
      Description copied from interface: ServerGameCommandsInterface
      This method is used to draw a card from the table
      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface ServerGameCommandsInterface
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player who is drawing the card
      fromVisible - True if the card is drawn from the visibles, false otherwise
      type - The type of the card to draw
      cardId - The id of the card to draw
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs
      IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException - If the player can't draw a card
      TurnsOrderException - If the player is trying to draw a card in the wrong turn
      IllegalPickActionException - If the player is trying to draw a card that is not available to pick
      EmptyDeckException - If the deck is empty
      MaxHandSizeException - If the player has reached the maximum hand size
      GameStatusException - If the game is not in the right status to draw the card
